* http://www.zigbee.org/what-is-zigbee/ ==SoC== ===[[Texas Instruments]]=== [http://www.ti.com/product/cc2530 CC2530] - SoC solution for 2.4GHz 802.15.4 / RF4CE / ZigBee *2.4GHz 802.15.4 Systems *ZigBee Systems (256KB Flash) *RF4CE Remote Control Systems :(64KB Flash and Higher) *Home/Building Automation *Industrial Control and Monitoring *Low-Power Wireless Sensor Networks *Consumer Electronics *Lighting Systems *Health Care ===[[Qorvo]]=== *Qorvo GreenPeak RF4CE - GP5X0/5X1 *Qorvo GreenPeak RF4CE - GP500C-NEC *Qorvo GreenPeak RF4CE - GP590 *Qorvo GreenPeak ZigBee PRO - GP710 *Qorvo ZB3.0 GW - GP502/GP711/GP712 *Qorvo ZB3.0 GW - ZigBee PRO (Rpi rev2) ===Other=== *[[Microchip]] - Explorer (16PIC24F) *[[Microchip]] - RF4CE (MRF24J40) *[[NXP]] - BeeStack (MC13226) *[[NXP]] - Kinetis (MKW2…) ===WiSoC=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- style="background:#eee;" !
